metadata.name: INDOMITABLE / Незламний
metadata.description:
Handmade Polaroïd created with chemicals, fluo ink, heat/cold & pressure at measured times.

This series is about unexisting places, shaped by our own interpretations. A cartography of emotions, using the pareidolia phenomenon. A short moment where past, present and future are reunited to create new meanings.

ONE LUCKY COLLECTOR OF THIS NFT EDITION WILL WIN THE ORIGINAL 10,7 x 8,8 cm PHYSICAL POLAROID ARTWORK ! A random draw will be made after the 7 days auction.
